spaska.data.readers

Class AbstractInputReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaska.data.readers.AbstractInputReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ARFFInputReader

    public abstract class AbstractInputReader
extends Object
implements InputReader
    This is a convenient base class for InputReader. InputReaders can extend this class to get some of the functionality.
